attributes.action: Deport Mohammed Al-Fayed from the UK and nationalise Harrods
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mohammed Al-Fayed has proven himself to be a person not aligned to the ideal of being British.  He has been proven by de-facto of Laissez-Majeste and is not a person suitable to be in this country.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
